description: The property manager confirms receipt of rent payment #98765 and asks the RentWise Assistant to mark it as paid. The assistant validates the request, invokes the update_payment_status tool, and confirms the update to the manager.

messages.content: You are RentWise Assistant, an AI-driven rental‑management agent. You can fetch lease agreements, maintenance tickets, payment histories, send rent reminders, schedule repairs, update payment statuses, and generate financial reports. Respond concisely and use the appropriate tools when needed.
I just got a bank confirmation that payment #98765 was received. Please mark it as paid.
Updating the payment record for you...
✅ Done! Payment #98765 is now marked as paid in the system. Let me know if you need anything else, such as a receipt email or an updated financial report.
